data.title: Chatzo
data.description: This was a side project I made while learning about socket.io. As an homage to a friend of my mine who says wacky random things, there is a chat-bot that will respond to messages from time to time: shib-bot.

data.title: Planit
data.description: This was a group project made during my full stack web development program at Galvanize. Users can come together to work on organizing a taking part in events.

data.title: Pizza Time
data.description: In a time that I was learning a ton about server-side programming, I wanted to see if I could still do something fully front-end. Is it weird that I'm more proud of this than anything else in my portfolio?

data.title: WordSearch
data.tagLine: A Wordsearch Puzzle When You Need One
data.description: My first deployed web app is a wordsearch puzzle generator based on a few user inputs. The words used to make the puzzle are referenced with an API that pulls a definition for each one.
